item.title: Filtering MongoDB by Date in R
item.description: 1 MongoDB at Work References 1 MongoDB at Work Some of the most important data I use at work are stored and access in MongoDB. We also use SQL1, but I often find myself reliant on using MongoDB most of the time since my shift to a data science role. In most of the things I do for work, I donâ€™t need all the available data. Filtering is a common task and one of the most common ways to filter data is by date.
